2134.subject: RUS
2134.descrlong: Alternative assessment for the third semester of Russian. Freshmen and sophomore transfers attempting to satisfy the Language Proficiency Requirement through assessment must enroll in RUS 101, 102, 201, and 202 concurrently, except for international students who may enroll only in RUS 202. Junior and senior transfers attempting to satisfy theLanguage Proficiency Requirement through assessment, must enroll in RUS 101, 102, and 201, except for international students who may enroll only in RUS 201 or 202.
